name: SER (Season 1)
description:
For Old-School Gamers...

Kuzey and Alper are two close friends. Getting bored of insincerity and the city life in Istanbul, Alper has moved to a rural area and tried to live a quiet life. But in time, interesting events in the town led the villager's anger to Alper. Kuzey who hasn't received any news from his friend, goes to the Gumus Town and realizes things are very different from what it appears.

What are the Zul Dolls?
What happened to Alper?
Where are the Townsfolk?

In the game which you will play, you should follow the tips yourself. Nothing will be shown to you directly. With the map inserted into the game you can understand where you are but you need to find them first.

The story will continue periodically.
